languages.text: "Один шанс чего? Убить нас всех? Ты хорошо продумал{mf||а} это свое милосердие к врагам Человечества?"
"Another chance to murder us all. Have you considered you might be showing a bit too much mercy toward the enemies of Humanity?"
languages.original_text: "Один шанс чего? Убить нас всех? Ты хорошо продумал{mf||а} это свое милосердие к врагам Человечества?"

traits.locale_text: "Another chance to murder us all. Have you considered you might be showing a bit too much mercy to the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: "Another chance to murder us all. Have you considered you might be showing a bit too much mercy toward the enemies of Humanity?"

languages.text: 「我々全員を殺すかもしれない脅威のひとつだ。あなたは人類の敵に情けをかけすぎだとは思わないか？」
languages.original_text: "Another chance to murder us all. Have you considered you might be showing a bit too much mercy toward the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: 「我々全員を殺すかもしれない脅威のひとつだ。あなたは人類の敵に情けをかけすぎだとは思わないか？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “又一个机会，让她有机会把我们所有人全都害死。你有没有想过，你对人类之敌可能有点过于仁慈？”
languages.original_text: "Another chance to murder us all. Have you considered you might be showing a bit too much mercy toward the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: “又一个机会，让她有机会把我们所有人全都害死。你有没有想过，你对人类之敌可能有点过于仁慈？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Otra oportunidad para asesinarnos a todos. ¿Ha pensado que quizá muestre demasiada piedad con los enemigos de la Humanidad?».
languages.original_text: "Another chance to murder us all. Have you considered you might be showing a bit too much mercy toward the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: «Otra oportunidad para asesinarnos a todos. ¿Ha pensado que quizá muestre demasiada piedad con los enemigos de la Humanidad?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Eine weitere Gelegenheit, uns alle zu ermorden. Seid Ihr einmal auf den Gedanken gekommen, dass Ihr den Feinden der Menschheit vielleicht etwas zu viel Gnade zeigt?"
languages.original_text: "Another chance to murder us all. Have you considered you might be showing a bit too much mercy toward the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: "Eine weitere Gelegenheit, uns alle zu ermorden. Seid Ihr einmal auf den Gedanken gekommen, dass Ihr den Feinden der Menschheit vielleicht etwas zu viel Gnade zeigt?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Une seconde chance de tous nous tuer... Il ne vous a donc jamais traversé l'esprit que vous étiez peut-être un peu trop {mf|clément|clémente} envers les ennemis de l'humanité ? »
languages.original_text: "Another chance to murder us all. Have you considered you might be showing a bit too much mercy toward the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: « Une seconde chance de tous nous tuer... Il ne vous a donc jamais traversé l'esprit que vous étiez peut-être un peu trop {mf|clément|clémente} envers les ennemis de l'humanité ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Hepimizi öldürmesi için bir şans daha. Acaba İnsanlığın düşmanlarına biraz fazla merhamet ediyor olabilir misin?"
languages.original_text: "Another chance to murder us all. Have you considered you might be showing a bit too much mercy toward the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: "Hepimizi öldürmesi için bir şans daha. Acaba İnsanlığın düşmanlarına biraz fazla merhamet ediyor olabilir misin?"
